comment: 3 major assignments and you can't afford to mess them up so try your best on them. Rest is discussions and little assignments which is comparatively easy to complete.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Wonderful instructor. 3 major assignments, no final exam. She gives wonderful feedback and her grading is clear. Assignment instructions are clear. Lots of reading from the textbook. She replies to emails quickly and answers any questions you have and will give you even more in depth feedback on your essays if you ask for it. Would take again!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Shes a wonderful instructor. Has 3 major assignments, lots of discussion posts. She gives amazing feedback on essays and has very clear grading criteria. Not too difficult if you're good at writing. Essays are based on arguments and page requirements are long, usually 4-6 pages per assignment. Overall, great class and great instructor.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Was a really easy class and interesting

Very sweet and responds to emails fast. Gives feedback within a week of major assignment due date. Straightforward with what she expects, and it is very doable. 3 major assignments and a lot of smaller ones to help your grade. Don't forget to add you attendance paragraph each week but definitely take her if you can shes awesome.
she was amazing very easy course def take her

I took Ms.Millberger for English 1101 online and it was very easy to manage the class. Their are a total of 3 major papers and the rest of the class is easy weekly assignments you have about 2 weeks to write each essay and she gives great feedback. Great class if you do what you are supposed to do.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Good class. Sometimes the instructions were not clear so you had to re do the assignments but they could be done in less than 30 min. Does take some time to reply back but over all great easy online English class.
